Given these points, I’m not convinced any single player stands out as the definitive Mafia yet. However, I’m leaning toward **keeping an eye on Player 4** because their extra caution feels a bit out of step for a typical villager at this stage. That said, I don’t want to rush to a verdict without hearing the final round of thoughts.

I’ll hold off on casting a vote for now and look forward to the next round’s input before we make a final decision.]
